channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12071] conftest is not documented
item.description: HADOOP-7947 introduced new hadoop subcommand conftest, but it is not documented yet.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This message was automatically generated.

HADOOP-12071 patch 002

  • patch applies to trunk
  • quick review of ConfTest itself, with IDE suggested/applied cleanup

I looked at what it'd take to add XInclude support (as it fails right now), but concluded it'd take work. I just documented.

If we really wanted to improve conftest I'd go for XSD/RelaxNG validation followed by reading the DOM and checking that way.
